explains: n. （动植物的）膜；（可起防水、防风等作用的）膜状物
wordGroup: membrane structure 膜结构，薄膜结构
membrane filtration 膜过滤；隔膜渗滤作用；膜滤法
plasma membrane 质膜；浆膜（等于cell membrane）
basement membrane 基膜；基底膜；底膜
membrane process 离子交换膜法；薄膜技术；薄膜法
membrane switch 薄膜开关，膜片开关
reverse osmosis membrane 反渗透膜；逆渗透膜
plastic membrane n. 塑性膜，塑料薄膜

sentences.en: These are substances which specifically latch onto the protein on the cell membrane.
sentences.cn: 这些是专门黏附在细胞膜蛋白质上的物质。

sentences.en: In pterosaurs a greatly elongated fourth finger of each forelimb supported a wing-like membrane.
sentences.cn: 翼龙的每个前肢都有一根长长的第四指，支撑着像翅膀一样的膜。

sentences.en: Archaeopteryx shows no obvious features of gliders, such as a broad membrane connecting forelimbs and hind limbs.
sentences.cn: 始祖鸟并没有表现出明显的滑翔机的特征，比如有一层连接前肢和后肢的宽膜。
